name: Role Possession Game(RPG)
description:
An RPG game where you control the the heroes and the enemies.

Basically you are fighting yourself

Your Pet Ghost Joins with your enemies so that he has slight control over their actions(he is a novice ghost though so he cannot keep them from trying to kill you)

Note: use enter key to select o n the main menu, use the mouse for selection in the battle;

This is a submission for GMTK GameJam 2021

Letting me know of any bugs is greatly appreciated

Making a game in 48 hours makes it hard to test everything
